channel.title: Thread-149 cursor problem
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to fix this cursor error:
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-149" java.lang.NullPointerException at Jframe.setCursor(Jframe.java:37) at client.drawTooltip(client.java:9370) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:8758) at client.method146(client.java:11873) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8039) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8687) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4666) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
Link to cursor:
[code]Public static void setCursor(int id) { Toolkit toolkit = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit(); Cursor cursor = toolkit.createCustomCursor(toolkit.getImage("sign.signlink.findcachedir() +/Sprites/Cursor "+id+".PNG"), new Point(0,0), "C:/kbvecache/Sprites/Cursor "+id+".PNG"); frame.setCursor(cursor); }[/code]

item.title: Thread-149 cursor problem
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Groen Mod Groen
item.description:
@Mod_Groen wrote:

Does anyone know how to fix this cursor error:

Exception in thread "Thread-149" java.lang.NullPointerException at Jframe.setCursor(Jframe.java:37) at client.drawTooltip(client.java:9370) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:8758) at client.method146(client.java:11873) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8039) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8687) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4666) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Link to cursor:

Public static void setCursor(int id) { Toolkit toolkit = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit(); Cursor cursor = toolkit.createCustomCursor(toolkit.getImage("sign.signlink.findcachedir() +/Sprites/Cursor "+id+".PNG"), new Point(0,0), "C:/kbvecache/Sprites/Cursor "+id+".PNG"); frame.setCursor(cursor); }
